text: Uwo ari we wese uhakana Allah nyuma yâ€™uko yemere, (ibihano bikomeye biramutegereje), uretse wa wundi uzabihatirwa (agahakana ku rurimi) ariko umutima we wuje ukwemera (uwo nta cyaha aba akoze). Ariko abugururira ibituza byabo ubuhakanyi, abo uburakari bwa Allah buri kuri bo, kandi bazahanishwa ibihano bihambaye
